name: Materials-2020| World Congress on Materials Science and Engineering| Massive Sci Group Conferences
content: Dear Colleague, I'm honored to invite you as a speaker in World Congress on Materials Science and Engineering, an organized Conference happening on June 17-19, 2020 in London, UK. The conference emphasis mainly on the theme “Innovative Ideas and Approaches for Striving the Future of Materials Science and Engineering”. For more information please visit the website: http://massivegroup.org/materials-science-conference/ Regards, Dr. Clara Carenco Email-id: materials@massivegroup.org materials@massivegroup.info
